101.title: Operation Sandman
101.plot: G.I. JANE meets MILLION DOLLAR BABY births COURAGE UNDER FIRE.

102.title: On Any Given Sunday
102.plot: When World War III breaks out between the United States and its NATO allies versus the Russian Federation and the Iranian Islamic Republic and their allies, first female Navy fighter combat commander "Shrike" with four kills on her record must compete with her former lover-flight instructor veteran combat fighter commander "Hawk" for command of Puking Dogs Squadron. Their singular pursuit of who is best suited to command is complicated by an embedded double agent drone defense contractor and by the commanders' on and off again love affair. After losing five members of...

-1.title: 1:101 Operation Sandman
-1.plot: Two USN elite male and female fighter pilot commanders compete for combat supremacy with romance complications between them onboard the U.S.S. Harry Truman when disaster strikes during a flight mission killing two senior level pilots and pitting drones double agent antagonists against manned fighters simultaneous to formal declaration of World War III by the United States and NATO after unprovoked preemptive attacks by the Russian Federation, Iran and their allies against Israel and Washington, D.C.
